title: Katalon with Winium for Desktop Applications in Katalon Studio
description: As you may know, Katalon Studio only supports WebUI, Mobile, and   API automation testing. However, there is a workaround solution to   this problem, utilizing Winium .jar package in order to test   desktop applications.

frontMatter.title: Katalon with Winium for Desktop Applications in Katalon Studio
